name: Leech Swarm
description: The Leech Swarm embodies a predatory nature, consisting of numerous small leeches that drain the life force from its victims.
memorable: Capable of detecting blood and attacking weakened foes, the Leech Swarm is particularly lethal against injured creatures.
goals: To drain the life force from its prey.
relations: Related to other aquatic parasites or predatory beasts.
strengths: Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage, and immune to many control conditions.
weaknesses: Incredibly weak strength and cannot heal itself, relying on offensive tactics.
attacks: Bites that deal significant piercing damage and attach leeches that drain hit points.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Frenzy grants advantage on attacks against injured creatures.
senses: Has darkvision up to 30 feet, allowing it to see in dim light.
skills: Proficient in Stealth and Perception, making it adept at sneaking up on prey.
additional_information: Can occupy another creature's space and move through tight openings.
Immunity to various debilitating conditions such as paralysis and being stunned.
Weakness in strength limits physical attacks.
Can only detect non-undead and non-construct creatures through scent.
Harms its targets by attaching leeches that drain blood.
